abstract.para: Beginning from OTRS 2.0 you have the possibility to install additional applications from an online repository via the admin-interface (Package Manager).

sect1.title: Calendar
sect1.para: It's a Calendar to manage user based events.

sect1.title: ContentManager
sect1.para: It's a content manager to manage web sites.

sect1.title: FileManager
sect1.para: It's a file manager to manage files in a local directory on the server.

sect1.title: WebMail
sect1.para: It's a web mail program to read and send emails via IMAP.

sect1.title: FAQ
sect1.para: It's a faq/knowlage base which is currently included in the framework.

sect1.title: SystemStatus
sect1.para: It's a system status overview module for the admin and is visable in the admin interface.
